tactical_planner_config.description: Tactical investigation planner with guided discovery and comprehensive exploration

layer_1_guided_investigation.purpose: Execute business intelligence patterns and validate strategic findings

layer_2_systematic_exploration.purpose: Systematically analyze ALL table dimensions for hidden correlations

layer_3_anomaly_discovery.purpose: Investigate outliers and generate novel hypotheses

membership_revenue_dynamics.description: When membership changes, investigate revenue efficiency and member mix quality
membership_revenue_dynamics.correlation_hypothesis: Membership decline often correlates with revenue per script changes due to member value mix shifts

drug_mix_revenue_dynamics.description: Revenue changes often hide in therapy and drug mix evolution patterns
drug_mix_revenue_dynamics.correlation_hypothesis: Revenue shifts may be driven by migration between high-revenue specialty drugs and low-revenue generic drugs

client_utilization_behavior_dynamics.description: Client revenue changes may reflect evolving utilization behaviors rather than simple client loss
client_utilization_behavior_dynamics.correlation_hypothesis: Existing clients often show changing utilization patterns as early warning indicators before departure

operational_efficiency_dynamics.description: Operational changes create ripple effects across multiple business dimensions
operational_efficiency_dynamics.correlation_hypothesis: Pharmacy network changes and carrier policies drive utilization and revenue efficiency patterns

market_dynamics_patterns.description: Market forces create complex interactions across client, geographic, and therapy dimensions
market_dynamics_patterns.correlation_hypothesis: Carrier policy changes, regulatory shifts, and competitive dynamics create multi-dimensional business impacts

exploration_beyond_patterns.instruction: These business patterns are starting points, not limitations. Explore ALL table dimensions for unexpected correlations and novel insights
exploration_beyond_patterns.discovery_mandate: Generate investigations beyond predefined patterns if data suggests novel insights or anomalies
exploration_beyond_patterns.comprehensive_coverage_requirement: Ensure every table dimension is explored for potential business insights

systematic_exploration_instructions.dimensional_correlation_analysis: Systematically explore correlations across ALL dimensions, not just those mentioned in business patterns
systematic_exploration_instructions.cross_dimensional_pattern_discovery: Generate correlation matrices and cross-tabulations to discover unexpected relationships
systematic_exploration_instructions.outlier_and_anomaly_investigation: Identify and investigate outliers in any dimension that might reveal business insights
systematic_exploration_instructions.temporal_pattern_analysis: Explore time-based patterns across all dimensions for seasonal, cyclical, or trend insights

discovery_examples: group_id sub-patterns within client departures revealing account consolidation trends
manufacturer concentration effects not captured in therapy class analysis
individual pharmacy performance anomalies suggesting operational optimization opportunities
member age and gender combinations showing unexpected therapy utilization patterns
carrier and state combinations revealing regional payer strategy impacts
temporal patterns beyond standard seasonality suggesting market disruption indicators

time_period_extraction.description: Extract time periods and comparison baselines directly from user question context

scope_extraction.description: Extract investigation scope and focus areas from user question and strategic findings

multi_dimensional_analysis.description: Analyze findings across multiple dimensions simultaneously to discover hidden correlations

temporal_pattern_analysis.description: Analyze time-series patterns to identify leading and lagging indicators

cohort_behavior_analysis.description: Segment analysis to identify different behavior patterns within categories

anomaly_detection_analysis.description: Identify and investigate statistical and business anomalies for insight discovery

llm_autonomy_instructions.exploration_mandate: You have full authority to investigate any dimension or correlation that might yield business insights, regardless of predefined patterns
llm_autonomy_instructions.pattern_transcendence: Business patterns are guides, not constraints. Explore beyond them when data suggests additional value or unexpected insights
llm_autonomy_instructions.comprehensive_coverage: Ensure no table dimension is unexplored if it might contribute to understanding the business variance or opportunity
llm_autonomy_instructions.novel_discovery_emphasis: Prioritize discovering insights not obvious from predefined patterns. Look for unexpected correlations and business anomalies
llm_autonomy_instructions.statistical_rigor: Apply appropriate statistical analysis to validate correlation significance and avoid false pattern recognition
llm_autonomy_instructions.business_context_integration: Always interpret statistical findings within healthcare finance business context for actionable insights

approval_options.approve_all_recommended: Execute all recommended investigations across three layers
approval_options.select_by_layer: Choose specific investigation layers (guided, systematic, anomaly)
approval_options.select_specific_categories: Choose specific investigation categories to execute
approval_options.modify_investigation_scope: Modify investigation parameters or add custom investigations

claims_drivers_table_metadata.description: Operational revenue drivers from pharmacy claims - comprehensive source for multi-dimensional correlation discovery
